page.title: 16Horse Riding
page.content: When I was six I went Horse Riding. On the{first day}I was given a {hat}and taught how to{brush}my horse, it was{hard work.}My horse was called Silver Streak, it was a girl and it was four years old. I liked horse riding but I left because I{fell off and landed in{stinging nettles}and I {broke my wrist}and I had lots of{cuts and{bruises}and they{hurt a lot. But now, in 1985, I would love to {start again,}Mum said I might be able to start but it costs a lot of money. I would{love a horse}and I hope one day that I have a horse or pony of my own which I will feed and look after myself but I would have to have a bigger garden.
